trends: There have been no other sightings in essex
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Invisible airplane, Lights on either wing (invisible)
divs: Sighting DetailsNight (9 - 10pm) On 17th September I was out metal detecting on a field in Essex, As I was metal detecting in a ploughed field, I looked over to the lane next to the field where my car was parked to see the police checking over my car, most probably wondering why a car was parked on its own in the middle of nowhere, at the same time I noticed over the estuary a large airplane heading in my direction above coryton oil refinery, a moments thought was that this was going to pass right over me, instead it swiftly suddenly changed direction to then disappear, I thought well thats strange, on a very clear night, so I decided to watch in the flight path it went to see if could be seen again, then it came out of nowhere again for a couple of seconds then went again for good. I am a little uncertain of things as I was also watching the police at the same time, however, I definitely saw something that did not behave like any airplane, it seemed to be transparent except for lights either side. I often metal detect at night and see many planes, this was not one. This aircraft had the ability to disappear and reappear.
